summary: This is an email from the Federal Bureau of Prisons Office of Internal Affairs regarding the provision of email records in response to an OIG request. It explains that emails from 17 specific staff members are being provided on encrypted disks, with additional emails referencing inmate names and registration numbers to follow.

events.title: Email Records Provision
events.description: The Federal Bureau of Prisons Office of Internal Affairs informs a recipient that email records from 17 specific staff members are being provided on encrypted disks in response to an OIG request, with additional records to follow.

locations.context: Office of the Federal Bureau of Prisons Office of Internal Affairs

keyFacts: The document is an email from the Bureau of Prisons Office of Internal Affairs regarding an OIG case (2019.010614).
Email records from 17 specific staff members are being provided on encrypted disks, with additional emails referencing inmate names and registration numbers to follow.
The data is encrypted with SEE (Secure Email Encryption) and requires the SEE Storage Access Utility to read.
The password to access the files is 'bopl!search2019'.
The responsive items were exported into Microsoft Outlook PST files.
